page.title: 11TEMPLETON Y.F.C.
page.content: Templeton Y.F.C was founded by Mr. Leslie John in September 1973. About thirty people attend every week on Fridays at 7.30pm. The annual subscription is Â£4.00 for ages 10 to 16, Â£6.00 for ages 16 to 21, Â£8.00 for ages 21 to 26. Activities include visits to places of interest such as police and fire stations, performing plays,entering competitions and working for charity. The club won first prize and the Challenge Cup in the Pembrokeshire Y.F.C. Rally three times. Several members have entered the Royal Welsh Show. They have won over 100 cups during the last 13 years. The Y.F.C. runs the Templeton Show and the Carnival in the summer. Club members sometimes make exchange visits abroad.
